title: My ping is insane right now
body: Outside of lol my ping is around 23-29 but when i get in a game i start at around 60 then go to 3000 in a couple seconds... help?

replies.body:
If that ping is spiking up like that at random points, it might be more related to packet loss rather than the usual lag you might encounter. Essentially, packet loss means that your connection is losing chunks of the data it's carrying so once it hits our servers they can't read it correctly anymore, causing some crazy lag spikes on your end. 

Take the network logs from that game if you can and have the [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them for me. Grab a screenshot and post it here so that I can take a look!

Im not sure what it was but the packet loss has stopped for now. It was shortly after I got the hextech repair tool..

Sounds like your ping calmed down a bit as well (hopefully)? If that happens again, make sure you grab those network logs after the match ends and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), *NOT* the HRT, scan it to see how your connection looked. If you're not sure what it means, feel free to post it here for us to look at.

i know the feeling, the only thing you can really do is submit a ticket about the issue and explain it in detail to them.

i am only suggesting you do because thats why i did for a weeks worth of inconsistent ping myself, which it only happened after the 7.20 ping dropped. it honestly felt like i was back on a PS3 playing Cod and having all my games lag switched or something along those lines.

But the strange part was even after i sent the ticket in i still had to wait at least 3 days, because of a high intake of ticket requests im assuming, however the moment i did get a reply, the ping spiking started to slow down and become less frequent which is strange to me, almost like they did something to connections i was having on there end.

but yeah you should just submit the ticket and wait, it will be fixed i can tell you that
